Nagi!"},{"lineNumber":202486,"originalJapaneseLine":"　構えなさい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Get ready!\""},{"lineNumber":202487,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、まずいまずいまずい！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"B-bad, bad, bad!"},{"lineNumber":202488,"originalJapaneseLine":"　＜エール＞ちゃん、来るよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"<El>-chan, he's coming!\""},{"lineNumber":202489,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ますぞえだかなんだか知らねーが！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don't care if you're Masuzoe or whatever!"},{"lineNumber":202490,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺様に喧嘩売って生きて帰れると思うなよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Don't think you can pick a fight with me and get away alive!\""},{"lineNumber":202491,"originalJapaneseLine":"「行くぞ、＜エール＞！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Let's go, <El>!"},{"lineNumber":202492,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こいつをしばき回す！」","translatedEnglishLine":"We're gonna beat him up!\""},{"lineNumber":202493,"originalJapaneseLine":"「にゃっ、主君殿！　来るでござるよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nya! Lord! attacked!"},{"lineNumber":202513,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは順調にハニーインザスカイを","translatedEnglishLine":"You were steadily making your way through Honey in the That thing.\""},{"lineNumber":202526,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んだぁ？　ありゃあ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What is that?\""},{"lineNumber":202527,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ににんにん、主君殿、気をつけてでござる」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nin-nin, my lord, please be careful.\""},{"lineNumber":202528,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……警戒しながら進もうか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Let's proceed cautiously.\""},{"lineNumber":202529,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだろーね、あれ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I wonder what that is...\""},{"lineNumber":202530,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ああ？　なにあれ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Huh? Could it be an enemy...?\""},{"lineNumber":202532,"originalJapaneseLine":"「クキキキ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kukikiki,"},{"lineNumber":202533,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さぁて、鬼が出るか蛇が出るか","translatedEnglishLine":"Now then, will a demon appear or a serpent?"},{"lineNumber":202534,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なにかな、なにかな？　ワクワク」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What could it be, what could it be? Exciting!\""},{"lineNumber":202535,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んん？　なんだあれ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm? What is that...?\""},{"lineNumber":202536,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"................\""},{"lineNumber":202537,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃー！　かわぞえ様ー！　今日も素敵ー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kyaa! Lord Kawazoe! You're wonderful today too!\""},{"lineNumber":202538,"originalJapaneseLine":"「むおっ！？　マジか！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Muo!? Seriously!?\""},{"lineNumber":202539,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……この気配は！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...This presence!\""},{"lineNumber":202540,"originalJapaneseLine":"普段は静かにしている","translatedEnglishLine":"Usually quiet,"},{"lineNumber":202541,"originalJapaneseLine":"カオスと日光が突然喋りだした。","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaos and Nikkou suddenly started talking."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 松下姫はあなたの腕の中で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Princess Matsushita clung tightly in your arms,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひしっと抱きついてきた。
「ますぞえだかなんだか知らねーが！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't care if you're Masuzoe or whatever!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様に喧嘩売って生きて帰れると思うなよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't think you can pick a fight with me and get away alive!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「にゃっ、主君殿！　来るでござるよ！」
「ああもう！　あんだってのよ！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, geez! What the hell do you think you're doing!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 来る来る、来るよ、＜エール＞ちゃん！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's coming, he's coming, here he comes, <El>-chan!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐわははははははははははははは！

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's a more than worthy opponent!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだかよく分かんないけど！
魔人ますぞえが襲いかかってきた！
あなたは順調にハニーインザスカイを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You were steadily making your way through Honey in the Sky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなた達は順調にハニーインザスカイを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You all were steadily advancing through Honey in the Sky.
You kept moving forward without any issues.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雲で出来た大きな橋の上に何かがいるのが見えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you saw something on a large bridge made of clouds.
"I don't have a good feeling about this..."
"I wonder what it is? That thing."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ににんにん、主君殿、気をつけてでござる」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-what is that... Could it be an enemy...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さぁて、鬼が出るか蛇が出るか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now then, will a demon appear or a serpent?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なにかな、なにかな？　ワクワク」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What could it be, what could it be? Exciting!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きゃー！　かわぞえ様ー！　今日も素敵ー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kyaa! Lord Kawazoe! You're wonderful today too!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 普段は静かにしている
カオスと日光が突然喋りだした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos and Nikkou suddenly started talking.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 松下姫はあなたの腕の中で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Princess Matsushita clung tightly in your arms,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひしっと抱きついてきた。
「ますぞえだかなんだか知らねーが！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't care if you're Masuzoe or whatever!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様に喧嘩売って生きて帰れると思うなよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't think you can pick a fight with me and get away alive!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「にゃっ、主君殿！　来るでござるよ！」
「ああもう！　あんだってのよ！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, geez! What the hell do you think you're doing!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 来る来る、来るよ、＜エール＞ちゃん！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's coming, he's coming, here he comes, <El>-chan!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐわははははははははははははは！

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's a more than worthy opponent!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだかよく分かんないけど！
魔人ますぞえが襲いかかってきた！
あなたは順調にハニーインザスカイを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You were steadily making your way through Honey in the Sky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなた達は順調にハニーインザスカイを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You all were steadily advancing through Honey in the Sky.
You kept moving forward without any issues.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雲で出来た大きな橋の上に何かがいるのが見えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you saw something on a large bridge made of clouds.
"I don't have a good feeling about this..."
"I wonder what it is? That thing."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ににんにん、主君殿、気をつけてでござる」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-what is that... Could it be an enemy...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さぁて、鬼が出るか蛇が出るか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now then, will a demon appear or a serpent?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なにかな、なにかな？　ワクワク」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What could it be, what could it be? Exciting!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きゃー！　かわぞえ様ー！　今日も素敵ー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kyaa! Lord Kawazoe! You're wonderful today too!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 普段は静かにしている
カオスと日光が突然喋りだした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos and Nikkou suddenly started talking.
